casebody.data:
Allen MOORE, Appellant,
v.
George LOMBARDI, et al., Respondents. WD 80747 Missouri Court of Appeals, Western District. ORDER FILED: MARCH 6, 2018 Allen E Moore, Appellant Acting Pro Se, Counsel for Appellant. Michael J Spillane, Jefferson City, MO, Counsel for Respondents. Before Division Two: James Edward Welsh, Presiding Judge, Alok Ahuja, Judge, Anthony Rex Gabbert, Judge

ORDER

Per Curiam:

Allen Moore appeals the dismissal of his declaratory judgment petition challenging a parole denial and the procedures used by the Parole Board, including the holding of a parole hearing before he has been provided sex offender treatment. We affirm. Rule 84.16(b).
